attributes.action: We want Westminster to hold a 'confidence/no confidence vote' in David Cameron.
attributes.background: We want David Cameron out of power. We want Westminster to vote 'confidence or no confidence'. Get the MP's to cast a vote. We feel he is a weak PM and needs to go.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
